verbs.description: Nattily dressed , like [ARG2: the traditional jazzman] [ARG1: he] [V: is] , trumpeter Gregg Stafford stepped onto the stage of the Economy Hall tent at the New Orleans Jazz and Heritage Festival on Saturday

[R-ARG1: Nattily dressed , like the traditional jazzman he is] , [ARG1: trumpeter Gregg Stafford] [V: stepped] [ARG2: onto the stage of the Economy Hall tent] [ARGM-LOC: at the New Orleans Jazz and Heritage Festival] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday]
